title: Daily Life Vocabulary Challenge
description: A beginner-level fill-in-the-blanks test focusing on common words used in everyday situations.

questions.sentence: I eat an a____ every morning for health.
questions.translation: 为了健康，我每天早上吃一个苹果。

questions.sentence: Please close the d___ when you leave the room.
questions.translation: 离开房间时请关门。

questions.translation: 她喜欢在睡前读一本书。

questions.translation: 请给我一杯水好吗？

questions.sentence: We go to s_____ five days a week.
questions.translation: 我们要一周去五天学校。

questions.translation: 我的妈妈为我们做美味的晚餐。

questions.translation: 出门前穿上你的鞋子。

questions.translation: 很晚了，该上床睡觉了。

author: Gemini 3.0 Pro
